title: MissionDeck.ai Strategy Session - Oracle + Tank Brainstorm
description:
The Architect is launching MissionDeck.ai as a FREE product based on JARVIS Mission Control. It's positioned as 'Command Your OpenClaw Agent Army'.

This is a collaborative brainstorming task between The Oracle and Tank:

1. Analyze missiondeck.ai positioning
2. Research competitive landscape (vs other agent orchestration tools)
3. Identify feature gaps and opportunities
4. Recommend product roadmap enhancements
5. Marketing/positioning strategy for free product launch
6. Monetization opportunities (if freemium model)

Tank: Do deep competitive analysis and technical roadmap recommendations.
Oracle: Strategic positioning, market opportunity, go-to-market approach.

Deliverable: Comprehensive strategy document with actionable recommendations for The Architect.
